summary: tbh im getting less and less interested in dnp. i used to get excited whenever they tweeted or uploaded but now the tweet...
question: tbh im getting less and less interested in dnp. i used to get excited whenever they tweeted or uploaded but now the tweet notifications are just another notification annoyance and the uploads (rare as they may be) are like a chore that I HAVE to watch at some point. like speculating about phan was fun for a while, but im not obsessed and it got old quick. i feel like everything they have to offer is... dry, I guess. And I’m considering leaving if that doesn’t change fairly soon—I’m damn bored
answer: I feel the same basically. Welcome to the club.

reblog.comment: I feel the same basically. Welcome to the club.

trail.content_raw: I feel the same basically. Welcome to the club.
trail.content: I feel the same basically. Welcome to the club.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: @ the anon who wishes dan would ditch youtube/the phandom, as a phil girl, i have been wishing the same thing for phil for some...
question: @ the anon who wishes dan would ditch youtube/the phandom, as a phil girl, i have been wishing the same thing for phil for some time now. I love most of his videos, but i feel like he deserves so much better than to be reduced to phan, his sexuality and to dan's shadow. I wish he would realize that. I just want him to do something he could truly enjoy and where his creativity could shine, without all this pressure and objectification from phannies and without insults from dan stans
answer: Phil girls and Dan girls uniting under hatred for phan objectification? Who would have seen this coming in 2012??

reblog.comment: Phil girls and Dan girls uniting under hatred for phan objectification? Who would have seen this coming in 2012??

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: it's been ages since i saw the nakedbooths, (to confirm your theory: saw them once after i joined the phandom many years ago)...
question: it's been ages since i saw the nakedbooths, (to confirm your theory: saw them once after i joined the phandom many years ago) but i don't remember dan actually being naked??? just like, topless
answer: Oh, he was naked. He just always had something covering up the business end. A PlayStation controller, a lava lamp, a teddy bear, Phil

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I hate it when some people from the phandom tell us to stop talking about old stuff about dnp ‘cause they have already forgotten...
question: I hate it when some people from the phandom tell us to stop talking about old stuff about dnp ‘cause they have already forgotten about it etc. like lmao people are joining the phandom every day and they explore different details about phan, of course you might get bored with it if you’re a fan of their since 2009 or whatever, but stop shutting people’s mouths till their words don’t hurt anyone
answer: I’m with you here anon. It’s why I don’t mind talking about old shit that’s happened. Even the more “Taboo” subjects like that one video or Dan’s nakedbooths. The newbies are going to find that stuff anyway. So isn’t it better for someone to say “yeah this happened, here’s what the deal was, here’s why we don’t repost that stuff” instead of trying to keep it this big secret? Because when you try and keep it a secret, then you end up with new people finding that video, or those risky pics, and reposting them with the caption “DID ANYBODY KNOW ABOUT THIS???” Because they think they’ve stumbled upon a brand new piece of the puzzle.

Because when you try and keep it a secret, then you end up with new people finding that video, or those risky pics, and reposting them with the caption “DID ANYBODY KNOW ABOUT THIS???” Because they think they’ve stumbled upon a brand new piece of the puzzle.

The newbies are going to find that stuff anyway. So isn’t it better for someone to say “yeah this happened, here’s what the deal was, here’s why we don’t repost that stuff” instead of trying to keep it this big secret? Because when you try and keep it a secret, then you end up with new people finding that video, or those risky pics, and reposting them with the caption “DID ANYBODY KNOW ABOUT THIS???” Because they think they’ve stumbled upon a brand new piece of the puzzle.

The newbies are going to find that stuff anyway. So isn’t it better for someone to say “yeah this happened, here’s what the deal was, here’s why we don’t repost that stuff” instead of trying to keep it this big secret? Because when you try and keep it a secret, then you end up with new people finding that video, or those risky pics, and reposting them with the caption “DID ANYBODY KNOW ABOUT THIS???” Because they think they’ve stumbled upon a brand new piece of the puzzle.
